Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1244 Subdivision Application, Procedure and Approval Process

1244.01General procedure.

1244.02Minor subdivisions.

1244.03Major subdivisions.

1244.04Preliminary plan.

1244.05Amendments to preliminary plan.

1244.06Construction drawings submittal and review.

1244.07Record plan.

1244.08Vested rights and development agreements.

1244.09Subdivider’s agreements.

1244.10Signing and recording of record plan.

1244.11Appeals to City Council.

1244.12Suspension and invalidation of plat.

CROSS REFERENCES

Limitation of liability – see Ohio Const. Article 1, Sections 1 and 19; U.S. Const., 5th and 14th amendments

Minor subdivision defined – see P. & Z. Ch. 1242

Tree authority – see ADMIN. Ch. 280

Improvements and subdivider’s agreement, suspended record plan approval – see P. & Z. 1246.07

Traffic impact study to determine levels of service – see P. & Z. 1248.02(b)

Schedule of fees – see B. & H. 1464.04
